body.name: All-in-One Pan,Always Nonstick Multipurpose Saute pan,Large Skillet with Strainer,Deep Frying Pan with Lid(11-inch), PFOA Free chef’s pan,Dishwasher and Oven Safe (Cerulean)

features: 【All-IN-ONE】This pan comes with Strainer which provides you Multi Style Cooking Options : broiling, baking, sautéing, frying, and braising. Our pan will fit in every place.
【HEALTHIER COATING】The nonstick coating is made from a durable material providing a safe and healthy cooking surface for you and your family.Our pan is free from Forever chemicals like PFOA.
【NON-STICK】The nonstick coating on your pan provides a superior cooking surface that allows food to easily release without sticking or burning.
【EASY TO CLEAN】 Just wipe it with a paper towel or rinse it with water, thanks to its non-stick surface and easy-to-clean materials, our pan makes cleanup a breeze.
【SUITABLE FOR ALL STOVE】Designed to Heats up quickly and evenly,works on all types of stovetops, including gas, electric, glass, halogen, making it a versatile addition to your cookware collection.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why Choose LIGTSPCE All In One Pan? This pan comes with Strainer which provides you Multi Style Cooking Options everyday: broiling, baking, sautéing, frying, steaming and braising. Our cookware will fit in every place.

Healthier Coating This pan boasts a robust, high-performance, enduring, multi-layer non-stick surface that effortlessly releases food without requiring additional oils. Its coating is crafted without PFOA, lead, cadmium, or other Forever chemicals, which gives for healthy cooking in the kitchen.

Prepare Meals For The People You Love The greatest joys often come from life's most uncomplicated moments. Craft a delightful dish with a touch of innovation and a dash of affection, while relishing the company of your family and friends.
EASY TO CLEAN Just wipe it with a paper towel or rinse it with water. Our pan makes cleanup a breeze than normal ceramic cookware with large non-stick surface and easy-to-clean materials
Universal Our pan works on all types of stovetops, including gas, electric, glass, halogen. A versatile addition to your cookware collection.
INTERNALCIRCULATION Spikes on the underside of thelid helps keep the food moist.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handy all in one pan
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised on how versatile this frypan is. I received it quickly and was initially impressed on how nice it looked. I ordered the blue. The first think I cooked was sautéed fresh green beans in olive oil and garlic. The beans came out tender enough but not over cooked. I did have to get used to using a medium heat setting and was concerned it would not cook as well. That was not the case and the beans cooked evenly and were delicious. The clean up is minimal due to the non stick coating. It also stores well with my other pots and pans in my cabinet. I do recommend this product for its affordability, versatility and effectiveness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only pan I use now
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is a gorgeous pan and the functionality is superior to traditional pans. Heats up quickly, nothing sticks to it, I find myself reaching for it every time I cook. It’s large enough to cook a meal but not too heavy. The price is so great for the quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars New favorite pan
reviews.reviewText: I liked this pan as soon as I received it. Attractive and easy to handle. After using it often through the holidays it's now my favorite pan. So versatile, everything from fried eggs to braised short ribs. Works great on my new induction cooktop. Easy to clean. Great lid. No problems or shortcomings. And a nice price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really love this pan, the look and functionality. It’s an Always Pan dupe but I gotta say I like it more! It’s sturdy but light weight, nothing I’ve cooked sticks, easy to clean and just looks gorgeous. It’s also a good size for family meals. I’ve had it for months and looks brand new. I couldn’t believe the price. Just buy it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This truly is an All In One Pan! My daughter bought a similar one and told me how wonderful it was. I searched it on Amazon and the All In One Pan also showed up. The pans are almost identical. However, the All In One Pan is deeper, which I especially liked, and weighs slightly less (not heavy at all). It is more than big enough to hold a large roast along with potatoes, carrots, and onions! The overall reviews of the All In One Pan were higher than my daughter's pan. I hesitated for a moment because the All In One Pan is one-third the cost of the other pan. But, based on reviews and the deeper size, I ordered the All In One Pan. I received it in less than a week and used it that evening and every day since. I love it! I've made a complete breakfast in it, grilled cheese sandwiches (wonderful!), a full pan of goulash, etc. It is everything it is advertised to be. Clean-up is a snap - nothing sticks! The video shows a pasta dish in a cheese sauce - slides right out of the pan. I let the pan sit for an hour before cleaning. Absolutely no scrubbing. Washed in less then a minute in warm, soapy water and sponge. I highly recommend this wonderful pan for its ease of use, ease of clean-up, and ease on the wallet!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great pan. It is very versatile. I am trying to eat healthier in the new year and having the steam accessory makes eating healthy so much easier. You also do not have to add any oil or butter to the pan because the non stick interior makes the good cook and slide out of the pan fantastic. The ceramic coating also makes it very easy to clean. Overall one great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Everything works better than expected. Great non stick surface with secure lid. The steam pan works great and its low enough to fit plenty of food. Nice finish on the outside of the pan. Perfection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality product.
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my husband. He's enjoying using it. Easy clean up and because we're older it's easy to handle because it's not heavy like some other pans. Product is recommended.. quality is very good.
